relevant_findings.general: Patient in obvious distress, laying on left lateral decubitus position. Moderately anxious. Alert, oriented x3.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Scleral icterus present. Mucous membranes dry.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Diffuse hardening of abdomen. Tender to deep palpation over epigastric region, especially central region. Nondistended, no rebound tenderness. No masses.
